fields.name: Poisonous Tentacles (Passive):
fields.value: ** Your two town neighbors (the town players directly above and below you on the player list [the player on the top and bottom of the player list are neighbors, like a circle]) are poisoned (their ability silently fails, Investigative abilities may be told false information)

fields.name: Cut down:
fields.value: ** Attack a player with your Attack Power
